function.name: gtk_clutter_viewport_get_origin
function.description:
Retrieves the current translation factor ("origin") used when displaying the child of @viewport.
Since: 1.0.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: return location for the X origin in pixels, or %NULL

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: return location for the Y origin in pixels, or %NULL

parameter.name: z
parameter.parameter_description: return location for the Z origin in pixels, or %NULL

function.name: SECTION
function.description:
#GtkClutterViewport is a scrollable actor that can contain a single #ClutterActor. Using two #GtkAdjustment<!-- -->s it is possible to control the visible area of the child actor if the size of the viewport is smaller than the size of the child.
The #GtkAdjustment<!-- -->s used to control the horizontal and vertical scrolling can be attached to a #GtkScrollbar subclass, like #GtkHScrollbar or #GtkVScrollbar.
The #GtkClutterViewport can be used inside any #ClutterContainer implementation.
#GtkClutterViewport is available since Clutter-GTK 1.0

function.name: gtk_clutter_texture_set_from_pixbuf
function.description:
Sets the contents of @texture with a copy of @pixbuf.
Since: 0.8

function.name: gtk_clutter_get_text_aa_color
function.description:
Retrieves the text-aa color of @widget for the given @state and copies it into @color.
Since: 0.8

function.name: gtk_clutter_scrollable_set_adjustments
function.description:
Sets the horizontal and vertical adjustments used to determine the position of the scrollable actor.
Since: 1.0

function.name: gtk_clutter_texture_set_from_icon_name
function.description:
Sets the contents of @texture using the @icon_name from the current icon theme.
Since: 0.8

function.name: GtkClutterViewport
function.description:
The current origin of the viewport.
Since: 1.0

function.name: gtk_clutter_texture_new_from_icon_name
function.description: Creates a new #ClutterTexture and sets its contents to be the @icon_name from the current icon theme.

parameter.name: size
parameter.parameter_description: the size of the icon, or -1

function.return:
the newly created texture, or %NULL if @widget was %NULL and @icon_name was not found.
Since: 0.8

function.name: gtk_clutter_embed_get_stage
function.description: Retrieves the #ClutterStage from @embed. The returned stage can be used to add actors to the Clutter scene.
function.return:
the Clutter stage. You should never destroy or unref the returned actor.
Since: 0.6

function.name: gtk_clutter_get_mid_color
function.description:
Retrieves the mid color of @widget for the given @state and copies it into @color.
Since: 0.8

function.name: gtk_clutter_texture_new_from_pixbuf
function.description: Creates a new #ClutterTexture and sets its contents with a copy of @pixbuf.

function.name: gtk_clutter_embed_new
function.description: Creates a new #GtkClutterEmbed widget. This widget can be used to build a scene using Clutter API into a GTK+ application.

function.name: gtk_clutter_scrollable_get_adjustments
function.description:
Retrieves the horizontal and vertical adjustments used to determine the position of the scrollable actor.
Since: 1.0

function.name: gtk_clutter_get_base_color
function.description:
Retrieves the base color of @widget for the given @state and copies it into @color.
Since: 0.8

function.name: gtk_clutter_init_with_args
function.description: This function should be called instead of clutter_init() and gtk_init_with_args().

parameter.name: argc
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to the number of command line arguments.

parameter.name: argv
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to the array of command line arguments.

parameter.name: parameter_string
parameter.parameter_description: a string which is displayed in the first line of <option>--help</option> output, after <literal><replaceable>programname</replaceable> [OPTION...]</literal>

parameter.name: entries
parameter.parameter_description: a %NULL-terminated array of #GOptionEntry<!-- -->s describing the options of your program

parameter.name: translation_domain
parameter.parameter_description: a translation domain to use for translating the <option>--help</option> output for the options in @entries with gettext(), or %NULL

function.return:
%CLUTTER_INIT_SUCCESS on success, a negative integer on failure.
Since: 1.0

function.name: gtk_clutter_get_light_color
function.description:
Retrieves the light color of @widget for the given @state and copies it into @color.
Since: 0.8

function.name: gtk_clutter_viewport_new
function.description: Creates a new #GtkClutterViewport with the given adjustments.
function.return:
the newly created viewport actor
Since: 1.0

function.name: gtk_clutter_texture_set_from_stock
function.description:
Sets the contents of @texture using the stock icon @stock_id, as rendered by @widget.
Since: 0.8

parameter.name: stock_id
parameter.parameter_description: the stock id of the icon

parameter.name: size
parameter.parameter_description: the size of the icon, or -1

function.name: gtk_clutter_get_fg_color
function.description:
Retrieves the foreground color of @widget for the given @state and copies it into @color.
Since: 0.8

function.name: gtk_clutter_get_bg_color
function.description:
Retrieves the background color of @widget for the given @state and copies it into @color.
Since: 0.8

function.name: gtk_clutter_get_dark_color
function.description:
Retrieves the dark color of @widget for the given @state and copies it into @color.
Since: 0.8

function.name: gtk_clutter_get_text_color
function.description:
Retrieves the text color of @widget for the given @state and copies it into @color.
Since: 0.8

function.name: GtkClutterScrollable
function.description:
The #GtkAdjustment that determines the value of the vertical position for this scrollable actor.
Since: 1.0

function.name: gtk_clutter_init
function.description: This function should be called instead of clutter_init() and gtk_init().

parameter.name: argc
parameter.parameter_description: pointer to the arguments count, or %NULL

parameter.name: argv
parameter.parameter_description: pointer to the arguments vector, or %NULL

function.return:
%CLUTTER_INIT_SUCCESS on success, a negative integer on failure.
Since: 0.8

function.name: gtk_clutter_texture_new_from_stock
function.description: Creates a new #ClutterTexture and sets its contents using the stock icon @stock_id as rendered by @widget.

parameter.name: stock_id
parameter.parameter_description: the stock id of the icon

parameter.name: size
parameter.parameter_description: the size of the icon, or -1
